name: tasks-md
description: Tasks.md is a self-hosted Markdown-based task manager using plain text files. It offers a web UI to view, filter, and update tasks while keeping storage in Git-friendly format.
features: Markdown storage: Store tasks in plain text Markdown files that remain readable and editable outside the application.
Git-friendly format: Track task changes with version control systems using human-readable diff-friendly file formats.
Web interface: View and manage tasks through a modern web UI with filtering, sorting, and search capabilities.
Task filtering: Filter tasks by status, tags, priority, or custom criteria to focus on what matters most.
File-based organization: Organize tasks across multiple files and folders to match your project structure.
Syntax highlighting: Edit tasks with Markdown syntax highlighting and preview for rich formatting support.
Tag system: Categorize and group tasks using hashtags for flexible organization and quick filtering.
Status tracking: Mark tasks as todo, in progress, done, or custom statuses with visual indicators.
Due dates: Set and track due dates with calendar views and overdue highlighting for time-sensitive tasks.
Portable data: Keep all task data in standard Markdown files that can be backed up, synced, or migrated easily.
Search functionality: Find tasks quickly using full-text search across all files and metadata.
Bulk operations: Update multiple tasks at once with batch editing for efficient task management.
